blogPost.excerpt: Tech Out Loud is Process Street’s new weekly podcast. We find the best articles from the biggest names in tech and read them to you, out loud. Absorb timeless articles from the greatest minds while on the go, at the gym, or just chilling out.
blogPost.body: Tech Out Loud is Process Street’s new weekly podcast. We find the best articles from the biggest names in tech and read them to you, out loud. Absorb timeless articles from the greatest minds while on the go, at the gym, or just chilling out.
blogPost.title: Tech Out Loud - The best articles from top minds in tech direct to your ears
blogPost.author: Amanda Greenwood

localize.description: Tech Out Loud是Process Street的全新周播节目。我们从科技界的大人物那里找到最好的文章，并大声读给你听。在旅途中，在健身房，或者只是放松的时候，吸收最伟大的思想家的永恒文章。
localize.tagline: 来自科技界顶尖人士的最佳文章直接送到您的耳边。

localize.description: Tech Out Loud是Process Street的全新周播節目。我們從科技界的大人物那裏找到最好的文章，並大聲讀給你聽。在旅途中，在健身房，或者只是放鬆的時候，吸收最偉大的思想家的永恆文章。
localize.tagline: 來自科技界頂尖人士的最佳文章直接送到您的耳邊。
